scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary cradling the body of Christ after the crucifixion. Christ's body is pale and bears wounds, including a stigmata on his side and marks on his hands and feet. He is draped in a white loincloth. The Virgin Mary, wearing a blue mantle and white wimple, holds him tenderly, her face etched with sorrow. In the background, three crosses are visible on a barren hill, symbolizing Golgotha. The setting is an outdoor landscape with a body of water and distant structures on the left.
